description:
The App Driver team heads to a hot springs, but their travel app takes them to a creepy traditional inn instead! The scenery is scary and they get soaked to the bone... Something`s got to be wrong here!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tabi wa Michizure!? Trippmon no Kyoufu Trip
Travel Is About Companions?! Tripmon`s Trip of Terror!
旅は道連れ!? トリップモンの恐怖トリップ
